channel.title: Wierd Error
channel.description: OK, I am trying to connect my 525 client to my no-ip. It worked fine as 127.0.0.1 but when I insert my Server IP it wont load and it will just stop at connected to update server and go no farther. Does it not like my IP? Also I changed it in client2.java and that didnt work either. Same in just Client.java, nothing. Please Help! I BEG you! I really need all the help I can get! please!

item.title: Wierd Error
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Ok, I lost the client that i had before and got a new one and it wont even work with 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0. What is wrong? Can someone tell me all the places in each files to check? That be great. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Wierd Error

item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

OK, I am trying to connect my 525 client to my no-ip. It worked fine as 127.0.0.1 but when I insert my Server IP it wont load and it will just stop at connected to update server and go no farther. Does it not like my IP? Also I changed it in client2.java and that didnt work either. Same in just Client.java, nothing. Please Help! I BEG you! I really need all the help I can get! please!
